welcome.title: 🗺️ Welcome to ERIA Cartograph!
welcome.description: ERIA Cartograph is a powerful tool for creating and managing geographic data visualizations. Let us guide you through the main features.

navigation.title: Navigation Buttons 🧭
navigation.description: Use these buttons to switch between Resources and Projects. Resources are shared across projects, while Projects combine multiple resources.

authentication.title: Authentication 🔐
authentication.loginDescription: Login with your Google account to access external data sources.
authentication.loggedInDescription: You're already logged in! Click here to access your user menu.
authentication.additionalInfo: Authentication is required for downloading geographic data from GADM, Natural Earth, and other providers.

documentation.title: Documentation 📚
documentation.description: Click here to access detailed information about ERIA Cartograph, including licenses, system architecture, and technical documentation.

help.title: Need Help? 🤔
help.description: You can restart this tour anytime by clicking the help button. We're here to help you get the most out of ERIA Cartograph!
